nonprofits don’t want your new prototype they want money

they’re run by staff of people who are close to the issue and well versed int he tactics to achieve the objectives

start off with value assumptions:

you care about issues you know about the relevant organizations the organizations you care about aren’t already well funded (so exclude ACLU, etc.)

you don’t work for a major tech firm so can’t give, say, free laptops

things like: free hardware free enterprise software (google suite, adobe suite, microsoft suite, web hosting)
